bioconda.name: hicup
bioconda.summary: A tool for mapping and performing quality control on Hi-C data

biocontainers.name: hicup
biocontainers.summary: A mapping pipeline for hic interaction data. performs independent mapping on each end of the interaction pair and removes commonly found artefacts.

biotools.summary: A mapping pipeline for HiC interaction data. Performs independent mapping on each end of the interaction pair and removes commonly found artefacts.

bioschemas.name: HiCUP
bioschemas.summary: A mapping pipeline for HiC interaction data. Performs independent mapping on each end of the interaction pair and removes commonly found artefacts.
